borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such. It shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Proposed Ground Floor Plan - drawing no.1 - dated 04/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Proposed Roof Floor Plan - draeing no.2 - dated 04/11/2022</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Proposed Front and Rear Elevations - drawing no.3 - dated 04/11/2023</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Proposed Side Elevations and Cross Section&nbsp; - drawing no.4 - dated 04/11/2023</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">Location Plan, Block Plan and Site Location Plan - drawing no.5 - dated 04/11/2023</span></span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a single storey rear outbuilding
